mapper.sql: A.ID as A_ID, A.ROOT as A_ROOT, A.PARENT_ID as A_PARENT_ID, A.CHILD_LEVEL as A_CHILD_LEVEL, A.SITE_ID as A_SITE_ID, A.SEQUENCE as A_SEQUENCE, A.NAME as A_NAME, A.DESCRIPTION as A_DESCRIPTION, A.STATUS as A_STATUS, A.OBJECT_TYPE as A_OBJECT_TYPE, A.RECORD_STATUS as A_RECORD_STATUS, A.UPDATE_COUNT as A_UPDATE_COUNT, A.CREATOR_ID as A_CREATOR_ID, A.CREATE_DATE as A_CREATE_DATE, A.UPDATER_ID as A_UPDATER_ID, A.UPDATE_DATE as A_UPDATE_DATE, A.INHERIT_ABLE as A_INHERIT_ABLE
mapper.insert:
select CMN_TYPE_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into CMN_TYPE (ID, ROOT, PARENT_ID, CHILD_LEVEL, SITE_ID, SEQUENCE, NAME, DESCRIPTION, STATUS, OBJECT_TYPE, RECORD_STATUS, UPDATE_COUNT, CREATOR_ID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATER_ID, UPDATE_DATE, INHERIT_ABLE) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{root,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{childLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{siteId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sequence,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{objectType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{recordStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updaterId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{inheritAble,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update:
update CMN_TYPE A
A.ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.ROOT = #{record.root,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.PARENT_ID = #{record.parentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.CHILD_LEVEL = #{record.childLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.SITE_ID = #{record.siteId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.SEQUENCE = #{record.sequence,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.DESCRIPTION = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=CHAR},
A.OBJECT_TYPE = #{record.objectType,jdbcType=CHAR},
A.RECORD_STATUS = #{record.recordStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
A.UPDATE_COUNT = #{record.updateCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.CREATOR_ID = #{record.creatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.CREATE_DATE = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
A.UPDATER_ID = #{record.updaterId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.UPDATE_DATE = #{record.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
A.INHERIT_ABLE = #{record.inheritAble,jdbcType=CHAR},

update CMN_TYPE A
A.ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.ROOT = #{root,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.CHILD_LEVEL = #{childLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.SITE_ID = #{siteId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.SEQUENCE = #{sequence,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
A.OBJECT_TYPE = #{objectType,jdbcType=CHAR},
A.RECORD_STATUS = #{recordStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
A.UPDATE_COUNT = #{updateCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
A.UPDATER_ID = #{updaterId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
A.INHERIT_ABLE = #{inheritAble,jdbcType=CHAR},
where A.ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select distinct
from CMN_TYPE A
OR A.PARENT_ID = A.ID
order by
${orderBy}
select count(distinct A.ID) from CMN_TYPE A
